name: Vigoroth

passive.name: Pure Adrenaline
passive.effect: If this Pokemon is Knocked Out, it remains in play and is instead Knocked Out at the end of the turn (even if it is healed, evolved, etc). If it is removed from play, your opponent still gets a Prize Card.

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.effect: During your next turn, the base power of this Pokemon's Slash attack is 90.

flavor: While evolving, the rapid growth they need hyperstimulates their aggression.
